name: Modern Caravan with Ocean View
description: A beautiful and modern caravan with a stunning view of the ocean. Perfect for a romantic getaway.

name: Cozy Caravan in the Forest
description: Escape the city and relax in this cozy caravan nestled in a quiet forest. Great for hiking and nature lovers.

name: Family-Friendly Caravan Park
description: Spacious caravan perfect for families. Located in a park with a playground and swimming pool.
